row.incipit: . 20. c. 5. 6. 7, Decr. Greg. L. II. t. 28. c. 5. 6. 7). — „Cum sacrosancta Romana“ „Cum sit Romana“ „Ad haec si in“ „Si in una“ „Si duobus coram“.
row.abstract: Henrico, archiepiscopo Remensi, de appellationibus consulenti, respondet. Martene Coll. II. 911, Bouquet Rec. XV. 908, Mansi XXI. 1079, Migne 200 p. 802, (App. conc. Lat. X. 6. 7. 15, Coll. Lips. XLVII. 5. 6. 7, Coll. Cass. LI. 5. 6. 8, Coll. Bamb. XLII. 4. 5. 7, Comp. I. L. 2
